remarks: The function value of the evaluation function of a polynomial is an element of the underlying ring.  (Contributed by AV, 17-Sep-2019.)
statement:
fveval1fvcl.q $e |- O = ( eval1 ` R ) $.
fveval1fvcl.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
fveval1fvcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
fveval1fvcl.u $e |- U = ( Base ` P ) $.
fveval1fvcl.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. CRing ) $.
fveval1fvcl.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
fveval1fvcl.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. U ) $.
fveval1fvcl $p |- ( ph -> ( ( O ` M ) ` Y ) e. B ) $.
